issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hp7lq3abeus](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3Dhp7lq3abeus) ### Comment > Strangely the software works as soon as its installed even though the icon is paused and the settings are default, however as soon as the adguard is resumed or paused again the software will not allow youtube to load up a video. It worked fine at first but as soon as the basic function is used it breaks youtube and there's no clear way to fix it; even putting a youtube url in the allow list does not work Username: @Anonymous ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/91r9n2einjgosk4cswk4occows4ck88jtjmcla77i8.png?nc=1)

issue.title: edgeservices.bing.com (Bing Chat in Microsoft Edge)

labels.name: T: Stealth Mode issue
labels.description: The problem caused by the Stealth Mode module

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.15 (4385)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

edgeservices.bing.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

Steps to reproduce the problem:
1. Open the Microsoft Edge browser.
2. Open Bing Chat by clicking on the logo at the top right of the web browser’s window.
3. Start typing a question to Bing Chat.

Bing Chat reloads with a Discover page.

We can solve this problem by adding the following rule:
@@||edgeservices.bing.com^$domain=edgeservices.bing.com

As this problem can only occur in Microsoft Edge, the rule could be more precise: @@||edgeservices.bing.com^$domain=edgeservices.bing.com,app=msedge.exe

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.com) ### Comment > Problem :- ag base filter prevents the Brave shields to block of the blank frame on the right side of the inbox. But when i disable ad base filter then Brave Shields working without any issue. But i do not want to disable ag base filter for this one issue. > > Step to reproduce the issue :- Go to brave shields > set it to Aggressive > then go to custom filter > import ag base filter from this link https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt then open the inbox of mail.com. you will see the blank frame. But if you disable the ag base filter then shields will block the blank frame successfully. > > Possible solution :- add this filter ' mail.*##html.can-have-sky .page-body > .section-content:style(margin-right: 0 !important;) ' to ag base filter list. ### Screenshots

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Not reproduced it on my end.
First, update the app. Then try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body: Hello. An account is required for checking. If possible, please provide a test account to filters@adguard.com . Also try disabling filters/functions one by one and check which one is causing the problem. After you find what caused the issue - open the filtering log and take screenshots of all involved requests. Screenshots can be attached to this post on github, any additional information would be appreciated.

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.fr/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.fr%2F) ### Comment > Je dois régulièrement me reconnecter aux sites Google, Microsoft, Yahoo principalement... Depuis que j'ai désactivé l'autodestruction des cookies tiers, ça a apparemment réglé le problème. Pourtant, cette autodestruction des cookies tiers a toujours été activée auparavant sans poser aucun problème. Depuis quelques semaines, je suis systématiquement obligé de me réidentifier sur certains sites. Apparemment plutôt sur les sites principaux comme Google, Microsoft...
